alert.note: Alert for Bullitt; Hardin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 4:50PM EDT until June 22 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Hardin County in central Kentucky... Southwestern Bullitt County in central Kentucky... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 449 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Valley Station, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Knox, Shepherdsville, Lebanon Junction, Muldraugh, West Point, Bardstown Junction, Hobbs, Cedar Grove, Belmont, Pitts Point and Howard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
